title: The Papers: 'D-day' for Johnson as he gets 'ready for battle'
description: Wednesday's papers lead on Boris Johnson giving evidence later in a televised hearing on partygate.

title: The struggle to find a home in a picture-postcard village

title: Martina Navratilova: Tennis legend says she is 'cancer-free' after treatment
description: Martina Navratilova - an 18-time Grand Slam singles champion - says she is "cancer free" after fearing she "would not see next Christmas".

description: The former Microsoft boss says AI is the second revolutionary technology he's seen in his lifetime.

title: Met Police: Where next for the force after Casey review?
